title: YouTube User Authentication and Home Page Access Test
description: Verify that users can successfully sign in to YouTube with a Google account and access the home page. The test should confirm that all UI elements are properly displayed and functional across different browsers and devices.
preConditions: YouTube is accessible via web browser.
User has a valid Google account for sign-in.

steps.expectedResult: The YouTube home page loads successfully with recommended videos visible.

steps.action: Click the 'Sign In' button and enter valid Google credentials.
steps.expectedResult: The system accepts the credentials and logs the user in.

steps.action: Verify that the user is redirected back to the YouTube home page with personalized recommendations.
steps.expectedResult: Home page loads with personalized content based on user's watch history and subscriptions.

steps.action: Verify that all UI elements on the home page are properly displayed.
steps.expectedResult: All UI elements are visible, properly aligned, and functional.
